item.title: Crime report to FBI
item.description: To: FBI Terrorism Tip Line From: Vincent B. LE CORRE (French citizen residing in China) Subject: Video on X (Twitter) potentially inciting acts of terrorism against the United States I am writing to formally alert the FBI to a disturbing video posted on the social media platform X (formerly Twitter) that appears to incite violence and terrorism against U.S. targets. The video in question was originally published by the user @KFCQZ (identity unknown but possibly Chinese) and was later amplified via a quoteâ€‘post by French influencer Arnaud Bertrand (X handle @RnaudBertrand).
